mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.department_name AS "departmentName", a.department_code AS "departmentCode"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_department a
AND a.department_code LIKE '%'||#{departmentCode}||'%' '%'+#{departmentCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{departmentCode}, '%')
AND a.department_name LIKE '%'||#{departmentName}||'%' '%'+#{departmentName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{departmentName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
